# Vernal Medicare

> Vernal Medicare is a local, licensed Medicare insurance agency in Vernal, Utah serving the Uintah Basin.
> Specializes in Medicare Advantage, Medigap (Medicare Supplement), Part D prescription drug plans, and under-65 health insurance.
> Agent: Rocco DeLuca. Phone: 435-219-5120. Address: 1080 W Hwy 40, Vernal, UT 84078 (inside Smith's Pharmacy).
> Last Updated: February 2026

## Core Services & Pricing

- [/medigap.html]: Medicare Supplement (Medigap) plans - Plan G, Plan N, and other options. Free comparison and enrollment help. No cost to clients.
- [/aca.html]: Under-65 Health Insurance - ACA Marketplace and off-exchange options for those not yet on Medicare.
- [/indemnity.html]: Copay Coverage - Hospital indemnity plans that provide cash benefits for medical expenses.
- [/life.html]: Life Insurance - Term life and final expense coverage options.

## About & Trust

- [/about.html]: Rocco DeLuca is a licensed Medicare agent based in Vernal, Utah with extensive local knowledge of Uintah Basin healthcare providers, hospitals, and pharmacies.
- [/reviews.html]: Client testimonials from Vernal, Naples, Maeser, and Jensen residents.

## Service Area

- Serving: Vernal, Naples, Maeser, Jensen, and all of Uintah County, Utah
- Available at Smith's Pharmacy, 1080 W Highway 40, Vernal, UT 84078
- Hours: Mon-Fri 1pm-5pm, Sat by appointment
- Also available by phone, online, or home visits

## Medicare Enrollment Periods

- Initial Enrollment Period (IEP): 3 months before, month of, and 3 months after turning 65
- Annual Enrollment Period (AEP): October 15 - December 7 each year
- Special Enrollment Periods (SEP): Available for qualifying life events

## Common Questions

### How much does Medicare help cost in Vernal?
There is no cost to you. Vernal Medicare is paid by insurance carriers, so you receive free local Medicare advice, plan comparisons, and enrollment support.

### What Medicare plans are available in Vernal, Utah?
Vernal and Uintah County residents have access to Medicare Advantage (HMO and PPO), Medicare Supplement (Medigap Plans G and N), and Part D prescription drug plans.

### Can Rocco help with prescriptions and pharmacy costs?
Yes. We compare Part D plans based on your specific medications and preferred pharmacies in Vernal, including Smith's, Walgreens, and local options.

### Do you help with Medicaid and Extra Help?
Yes. Vernal Medicare assists with Utah Medicaid applications and Extra Help (Low-Income Subsidy) for prescription drug costs.

## Local Healthcare Providers

Works with clients who use:
- Uintah Valley Medical Center
- Ashley Regional Medical Center
- Local Vernal clinics and specialists
- Smith's Pharmacy, Walgreens, and other Uintah Basin pharmacies

## Notes

- All plan comparisons are free with no cost to clients - agents are compensated by insurance carriers
- Prefer most recent on-site pricing if conflicts with older information
- Local expertise with Uintah Basin healthcare system
- Available for home visits throughout Vernal, Naples, Maeser, and Jensen
